main.p: This site provides information using PDF, visit this link to download the Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software.

p.strong: Get the latest school information & updates related to the Coronavirus (COVID-19)

div.p: A message to the members of the APS community regarding the Coronavirus

h3.a: SAT Tests at AHS for Saturday 3/14/2020 are Cancelled

div.p: The SAT tests scheduled to be administered at Auburn High School on March 14, 2020 have been cancelled in response to Conornavirus concerns.

Auburn Middle School - Members of the Young Engineers Club had been working on "Engineering and Outbreak" since the beginning of the school year, before the coronavirus became an epidemic. The last activity they completed include creating a public service announcement to tell the public ways to be prepared. The club members created their information to include current events. Funding for the activities was provided through Donorschoose.org.

h3.a: School Committee Public Hearing on FY 2021 Budget

div.p: World Autism Awareness Day 2020 was celebrated on April 2nd! In the Auburn Public Schools, we CHOOSE TO INCLUDE each and every day as we LOVE our AMAZING students....every single one!!!
Please see the Coronavirus Notice to the Auburn Community.
A message to the members of the APS community regarding the Coronavirus
